sqlparse.utils.LINE_MATCH[source]
sqlparse.utils.split_unquoted_newlines(stmt)[source]

Split a string on all unquoted newlines.

Unlike str.splitlines(), this will ignore CR/LF/CR+LF if the requisite character is inside of a string.

sqlparse.utils.remove_quotes(val)[source]

Helper that removes surrounding quotes from strings.

sqlparse.utils.recurse(*cls)[source]

Function decorator to help with recursion

Parameters:

cls – Classes to not recurse over

Returns:

function

sqlparse.utils.imt(token, i=None, m=None, t=None)[source]

Helper function to simplify comparisons Instance, Match and TokenType :param token: :param i: Class or Tuple/List of Classes :param m: Tuple of TokenType & Value. Can be list of Tuple for multiple :param t: TokenType or Tuple/List of TokenTypes :return: bool

sqlparse.utils.consume(iterator, n)[source]

Advance the iterator n-steps ahead. If n is none, consume entirely.
